brand_protection.title: Corporate Counterintelligence
brand_protection.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for high-confidence decision-making.
brand_protection.list_title_Description_desafio: The integrity of your operations directly depends on the robustness of your supply chain — including both external suppliers and internal human capital. Failing to thoroughly vet a single link, whether a critical logistics partner or a newly hired executive, can introduce vulnerabilities across your structure. Superficial credential checks and purely financial audits are insufficient to detect the most damaging risks: premeditated fraud, conflicts of interest, hidden legal and reputational liabilities. Hiring or partnering without prior Background Check analysis is managing your business with an incomplete and dangerous view of your partners' operational and ethical reality.
brand_protection.list_title_solucao: Decisions Based on Facts, Not Assumptions
brand_protection.list_title_Description_solucao: Our Corporate Intelligence and Investigations service acts as your due diligence unit. We work discreetly and methodically to verify facts, analyze histories, and expose hidden risks before they become problems. Combining advanced open-source investigation techniques (OSINT), data analysis, and field investigations when necessary, we provide a comprehensive dossier to ensure your hiring, partnership, and investment decisions are based on verified information.
brand_protection.list_title2: Superficial credential analysis and purely financial audits are insufficient to detect the most damaging risks: premeditated fraud, conflicts of interest, hidden legal and reputational liabilities. SectionServiceSecond.title: Intelligence at All Levels
SectionServiceSecond.description: From strategy to action, we provide actionable intelligence at all levels of your organization.

card1.title: Strategic Intelligence (For Leadership)
card1.description: We deliver executive reports connecting the threat landscape (actors, trends, geopolitical risks) directly to business objectives and continuity. Our analyses answer the 'why' and 'what if', recommending strategic and investment directions.

card2.title: Tactical Intelligence (For Active Defense)
card2.description: We produce detailed dossiers on Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTPs) of threat groups targeting your sector. We describe their methods and tools to enhance threat hunting, improve detection rules, and train your defense team.

card3.title: Operational Intelligence (For SOC)
card3.description: We provide contextualized alerts on ongoing attack campaigns. Here, we enrich findings from our DDW service and other sources with business context, answering 'what does this mean for us now?' and providing high-fidelity IOCs for incident response.

card4.title: Vulnerability Intelligence (For IT and Infrastructure)

vip_protection.title: Deep & Dark Web Asset Surveillance and Protection
vip_protection.description: A unified service to monitor both the threat actor and your exposed digital assets.
vip_protection.list_title_Description_desafio: Your company faces two critical and invisible risks: the adversary planning an attack and your own sensitive data that may already be compromised. How do you monitor both sides — the hunter and the prey — in an anonymous and hostile environment like the Deep & Dark Web? Hiring separate solutions creates complexity and disconnects intelligence from action.
vip_protection.list_title_Description_solucao: Our Asset Surveillance and Protection service offers a comprehensive view of your risk in the digital underworld. We unify Threat Intelligence (attacker monitoring) with Exposed Asset Detection (searching for your data) in a single offering. Through a centralized platform and our analysts’ expertise, we correlate the attackers’ intentions with actual data exposure, enabling truly proactive defense and far more effective incident response.

OPSEC.title: OPSEC – Strategies for Anonymous Operations
OPSEC.description: In a scenario where every click leaves a trace and exposure matters.

modal.description: In a scenario where every click leaves a trace and exposure can compromise an entire operation, mastering OPSEC means having full control over your digital footprint, identity, and operational security.
modal.second_description: This course not only presents concepts — it delivers practical strategies, tested methods, and real techniques that Kryfal’s team applies daily in field protection.
modal.list_title: By the end of the course, you will be able to:
listItems: Create secure digital environments for investigations and operations;
Apply anonymity techniques to avoid tracking and exposure;
Reduce personal and operational attack surfaces;
Implement security routines protecting both the operator and the mission;
Operate confidently and discreetly in hostile environments — both physical and digital.

Threat_Intelligence.title: Fundamentals of Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI)
Threat_Intelligence.description: In an increasingly dynamic and complex digital scenario.

modal.description: In an increasingly dynamic and complex digital scenario, understanding the fundamentals of Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI) has become essential for any security professional or related field.
modal.second_description: This training presents concepts, methodologies, and frameworks forming the foundation of threat intelligence in a clear, structured way. Participants learn to differentiate data from intelligence, understand the intelligence cycle, explore widely used analytical models, and see how CTI supports strategic and operational decisions. The goal is to provide a solid foundation for advancing safely to more technical and analytical levels.
modal.list_title: By the end of the course, you will be able to:
listItems: Understand the Intelligence Cycle and its application in cyber threat contexts;
Recognize and classify different types of open sources (OSINT) for basic information gathering;
Understand core threat modeling concepts and how to adapt them to different organizational contexts;
Differentiate intelligence levels (Tactical, Operational, Strategic) and understand how each supports decision-making;
Gain an introductory view of the MITRE ATT&CK Framework and its use in identifying adversary tactics and techniques.

Pentest_Web.title: Web Pentesting
Pentest_Web.description: In a scenario where every click leaves a trace and exposure matters.

modal.description: In a scenario where web application security is constantly challenged by sophisticated threats and vulnerabilities can cost millions, mastering Web Pentesting means not only identifying flaws but anticipating and neutralizing attacks before they happen.
modal.second_description: This training does not limit itself to tools or checklists; it delivers attack and defense strategies, tested methodologies, and real techniques to protect critical infrastructures daily.
modal.list_title: By the end of the course, you will be able to:
listItems: Recognize and diagnose vulnerabilities such as injections (SQL, NoSQL), misconfigured access control, exposure of sensitive data, encryption failures, misconfigured security, API issues, and authentication bypass;
Use information gathering, exploitation, risk analysis, and pentest reporting methodologies, simulating real attacks to identify web application flaws;
Employ specialized tools like Kali Linux and OWASP ZAP to evaluate and test web applications in common OWASP Top 10 scenarios.
